description:
Description
Data are from an experiment, comparing the potency of the two herbicides glyphosate and bentazone in
white mustard Sinapis alba.
title: Potency of two herbicides
reference:
The lower and upper limits for the two herbicides can be assumed identical, whereas slopes and ED50 values 
are different (in the log-logistic model).

parameters.Dose: a numeric vector containing the dose in g/ha.
parameters.Herbicide: a factor with levels Bentazone Glyphosate (the two herbicides applied).
parameters.DryMatter: a numeric vector containing the response (dry matter in g/pot).

format: A data frame with 68 observations on the following 3 variables.
